item.title: As Mason County moves to a D-4 Exceptional drought status to
item.description: As Mason County moves to a D-4 Exceptional drought status today please remember how dry it is. Refrain from out door burning.For those who pray I ask that you pray for rain for our live stock as many of our crops have already gone to waste.
